sentences.en: All through the feudal ages the ruling class did their best to shackle women with Confucian ethics.
sentences.cn: 历代封建统治阶级都力图用礼教把妇女禁锢起来.

sentences.en: At last fasten tension chain ends with a shackle.
sentences.cn: 最后卸掉拉紧器,用卸扣紧固拉紧链的末端.

sentences.en: Don't Break Sap, Sheep, Shackle! You break it! You tank it!
sentences.cn: 别终止敌人处于被:闷棍, 变羊, 束缚亡灵之状态! 你终止它! 你就负责挡!

sentences.en: He is too young to shackle himself with the responsibilities of a family.
sentences.cn: 他还太年轻,不能用家庭责任来束缚自己.

sentences.en: He's too young to shackle himself with the responsibilities of a family.
sentences.cn: 他还太年轻，不能用家庭责任来束缚自己。

sentences.en: Install rear of spring onto rear spring shacklInstall shackle platDo not tighten.
sentences.cn: 安装弹簧后端至后弹簧钩环.安装钩环板. 不要旋紧.

sentences.en: Justin: Oh, my parents are in the shackle and move business.
sentences.cn: 贾斯汀: “噢, 我的父母都是做钢铁生意的. ”

sentences.en: Rig tong pins, shackle pins and bolts must be secured with the proper size split pins.
sentences.cn: 大钳销子,卸扣的销子和螺栓必须配有合适尺寸的开口销.

sentences.en: Shackle Undead now costs 9 % of base mana.
sentences.cn: 束缚亡灵现在消耗9%的基础法力.

sentences.en: Terminal may be hook link and shackle.
sentences.cn: 末端件可以是吊钩,吊环,卸扣等.

sentences.en: The memory is likely a shackle which never rusts away.
sentences.cn: 记忆像是一根永不锈蚀的铁链.

sentences.en: The prisoner broke the shackle with a hammer and escaped away.
sentences.cn: 囚犯用锤子打碎镣铐逃跑了.

sentences.en: The prisoner was fastened by a shackle.
They finally managed to throw off the shackles of colonialism.
sentences.cn: 他们终于挣脱了殖民主义的枷锁。

sentences.en: Traditional hierarchy histological structure has been a shackle of sharing knowledge.
sentences.cn: 传统的大学科层制组织结构正成为知识共享的桎梏.

sentences.en: Turn stop ar the 3 rd number. Pull the Shackle.
sentences.cn: 向右旋转停在第三个数字上. 拉开把手.

trans.tran_en: one of a pair of metal rings joined by a chain that are used for fastening together a prisoner’s hands or feet, so that they cannot move easily or escape

trans.tran_cn: 束缚，加枷锁，妨碍，阻碍，给…上手铐，[电]在…装绝缘器
